name: A2 Racer 2
description:
A2 Racer II is a computergame, developed by dutch softwarecompany Davilex.

In this game you have to race through different cities in the Netherlands. Through Amsterdam, Den Haag and Rotterdam and over the Dutch highway with losing the cops at your tail.

You can earn extra cash in every track by driving over speedcamera's. Other traffic can cause you to crash during the race. The cops try to stop you almost all the time when driving. Driving through gasstations will recover your turbo. The player with the highest score wins the game.
